title: Romance - Itoshiku Tsumetai Kimi
original_name: ロマンセ 愛しく冷たい君
sinopse:
Large compilation work containing:

The Romance series
Mijyukuna Tsubame to Emerarudo
Anata no Negai Watashi no Omoi
Sore wa Tenshi no Herikutsu
Watashi wo Hanazono e Tsuretette
Itoshiku Tsumetai Kimi
Yuuutsuna 5 Gatsu no Bara
Mathias
Kitto Ravian Rose
